00022         CHKRESULT(D3DXCreateFont(device, 20, 0, FW_BOLD, 0, FALSE, DEFAULT_CHARSET, OUT_DEFAULT_PRECIS,

00040         for(int y = 0; y < 1; y++)

00042                 SetRect(&fntRect, 7, wnd->GetBackbufferSize().height - 90 - y * 80, 0, 0);
